mapper.sql: id, department_id, login_name, password, no, name, email, phone, mobile, user_type, photo, login_ip, login_date, login_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, salt
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_user (id, department_id, login_name, password, no, name, email, phone, mobile, user_type, photo, login_ip, login_date, login_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, salt ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.loginFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update.foreach:
update sys_user
department_id = #{item.departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login_name = #{item.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
no = #{item.no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{item.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_type = #{item.userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
photo = #{item.photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_ip = #{item.loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_date = #{item.loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
login_flag = #{item.loginFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_by = #{item.createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
salt = #{item.salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: SELECT ro.en_name FROM ( SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = ( SELECT id FROM sys_user WHERE login_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) ud LEFT JOIN sys_role ro ON ro.id = ud.role_id where ro.del_flag=0 and ro.status=1;

SELECT sm.menu_code FROM ( SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = ( SELECT id FROM sys_user WHERE login_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) ud LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = ud.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm ON rm.menu_id = sm.id;

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rp.menu_id FROM (SELECT ro.id FROM (SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM sys_user WHERE login_name =#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) ud LEFT JOIN sys_role ro ON ro.id = ud.role_id) ri LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rp ON rp.role_id = ri.id) cr, sys_menu m WHERE cr.menu_id = m.id and m.status=1 and m.menu_type=0 and m.del_flag=0

select d.id as d_id, d.name as d_name, d.parent_id as d_parent_id, u.* from sys_department d left join sys_user u on d.id=u.department_id where d.status=1 and d.del_flag=0 and (u.del_flag is null || u.del_flag=0) order by d.sort,d.id

SELECT d.department_id FROM sys_role_department d LEFT JOIN sys_role role ON d.role_id = role.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role u ON u.role_id = role.id LEFT JOIN sys_user a ON a.id = u.user_id WHERE a.login_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT role.* FROM sys_role role LEFT JOIN sys_user_role u ON u.role_id = role.id LEFT JOIN sys_user a ON a.id = u.user_id WHERE a.login_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT b.user_id FROM sys_user a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on b.yy_user_parent_code = .yy_user_code WHERE a.user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.user_id is not null;
